title: bs插件的所有变量
author: lxl1230321
txt_content:
本人要用bs写个VIP购买的, 但是不知道[个人]的变量是啥.
全部变量-包括(看钱的,看点卷)的!
谢谢了. 455金粒全部恭上

replies.txt_content:
name:<name>

This is the displayed name of the item.

Possible Variables:

For Reward Items
%player% - Player Name
%name% - Player Name
%itemname% - Item Name
For Menu Items
%balance% - Players amount of money
%balancepoints% - Players amount of points
%itemname% - Item Name
%price% - Shop Item Price
%pricetype% - Shop Item PriceType
%reward% - Shop Item Reward
%rewardtype% - Shop Item RewardType




Possible Variables:

For Reward Items
%player% - Player Name
%name% - Player Name
%itemname% - Item Name
For Menu Items
%balance% - Players amount of money
%balancepoints% - Players amount of points
%itemname% - Item Name
%price% - Shop Item Price
%pricetype% - Shop Item PriceType
%reward% - Shop Item Reward
%rewardtype% - Shop Item RewardType




来自 http://dev.bukkit.org/bukkit-plugins/bossshop/pages/item-data/
.
应该看得懂把 这种英文小学生都会看了 ...............................
懒得翻译
